messages.no-data-alert: Nothing to show. You have no data that matches purpose of this page.

login.welcome-text: Code your occupational database according to a standardized classification scheme. Procode is a tool that supports your work by using advanced machine learning algorithms based on a large dataset of previuos codings
login.title: Login page

header.search-placeholder: Code or transcode an uploaded file

coding.help-text: Find a classification code for a selected classification scheme, entered data and selected coding level. The level usually (not always!) corresponds to the number of digits in a classification code.

results.dont-agree: None of the results correspond to the entered criteria
results.feedback-info: The field below lists all codes/titles for the corresponding classification scheme. Please specify which of them describes best the entered (searched) data
results.feedback-text: To help Procode become smarter, please specify which of the provided results is correct. If none is correct, then select the last option and click on the submit button below.

search.alert-select-scheme: Level not available before classification scheme is selected

file.variable-help: The selected file for coding may have included multiple columns. Select the one containing the data for coding/transcoding

transcoding.help-text: Transcoding or translation between different classification schemes is performed on this page. Simply select the starting scheme, desired code/title for transcoding and a target scheme. The results will appear immediately below the fields.

error.no-content-204: Procode failed to transcode the selected input code to the destination scheme. This is probably due to the missing transcoding rule between the two classification schemes.
